rows.text: @global.app_name will support you through your HHPP implementation journey. You will find sessions summaries, step-by-step instruction on how to lead activities, tips on how to handle facilitation challenges and tools to enhance your facilitation skills.

text.eng: @global.app_name will support you through your HHPP implementation journey. You will find sessions summaries, step-by-step instruction on how to lead activities, tips on how to handle facilitation challenges and tools to enhance your facilitation skills.
